timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: #USMNT has conceded seven goals in the first five minutes of #WorldCup games, most by any team in WC history.

timelineItems.text: Neymar puts Brazil up 1-0 with the 100th goal of this #WorldCup.

timelineItems.text: Is it just me or is Russia usually a boring team to watch?Either draws or low-scoring wins. Also huge tendency to choke in Finals. #WorldCup

timelineItems.text: Dear Belgium, you were my second team for #Brazil2014 but I'm now urging Russia to score. We can't let it end this way.

timelineItems.text: Something almost happened!!!!! #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Page
timelineItems.text: This game is the definition of anticlimactic; does either side want to win it? #BEL #RUS #WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Maksim Kanunnikov (Russia).
Kevin Mirallas (Belgium) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.

timelineItems.name: Euro Football Weekly
timelineItems.text: #BEL free kick hits the upright! Mirallas has livened up the Red Devils since his inclusion. #RUS #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Daryl Salmon
timelineItems.text: #BEL to beat #RUS 2-0 .. Nice and tidy #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: illiam solis
timelineItems.text: Belgium vs Russia? I'm torn cause I love chocolate but I do like Vodka too, who are you going for? #WorldCup2014 #WorldCup #Belgium #Russia

timelineItems.name: Veronica Cabrera
timelineItems.text: #BELvsRUS coming up! #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Chrissie
timelineItems.text: I want nothing more than to watch #WorldCup soccer all day, everyday.

timelineItems.name: Manon
timelineItems.text: Time to dance with the devil. #gobelgium #belrus #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Eden Hazard (Belgium) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Kevin Mirallas.
Corner,  Belgium. Conceded by Andrey Eshchenko.
Attempt missed. Marouane Fellaini (Belgium) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Kevin De Bruyne with a cross following a corner.
Offside, Belgium. Marouane Fellaini tries a through ball, but Kevin De Bruyne is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Darius
timelineItems.text: I swear Dries Mertens scores in every single game I watch. #WorldCup #BEL

timelineItems.name: Declan Olley
timelineItems.text: No surprise to see Chadli and Dembele dropped to the bench. Wilmots rewarding Fellaini and Mertens for their impact. #BELvsRUS #WorldCup
love that young squad of #BEL full of brave attacking professionals. I'm backing #Belgium #BELvsRUS #WorldCup #Brasil2014 #Brazil2014

timelineItems.text: Looking forward to a solid performance from #Belgium today. Individually better than #russia #WorldCup

timelineItems.text: I think Russia's national anthem is my favourite of the tournament #RUS #Brazil2014

timelineItems.name: Abdikhaliq Ahmed
timelineItems.text: Want Russia to win for Capello because people don't understand how good of a manager he actually is. #Russia #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Callum
timelineItems.text: #WorldCup Not surprised Fellaini is starting.

timelineItems.name: Shadow
timelineItems.text: Everytime i hear the russian national hymn i remember the scene with Ivan Drago and Balboa in that Sly movie #worldcup

timelineItems.name: Andy Oldham
timelineItems.text: Always enjoy watching #BEL play. Hopefully the first half isn't as dull as the last game. Fellaini brace? #Doubtful #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: #BEL break through. 1-0 with less than 5 to play. #BELvRUS

timelineItems.name: THN
timelineItems.text: ORIGI smashed it. Well played Hazard!! #WorldCup #BEL

timelineItems.name: Christian Long
timelineItems.text: There it is!!!! And Belgium should be advancing!#WorldCup

timelineItems.comment: Viktor Faizulin (Russia) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marouane Fellaini (Belgium).

timelineItems.name: Dillan MUFC
timelineItems.text: Januzaj better start against South Korea #WorldCup2014 #WorldCup #BelgiumVsRussia

timelineItems.name: Ishwar Venkatesh
timelineItems.text: BELGIUM! They've finally found the back of the net after some rather poor, boring and unimaginative football from them. #BEL #WorldCup

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 3 - All three Belgian goals at #WorldCup2014 have been scored by substitutes. Canny. #BEL #RUS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Toby Alderweireld (Belgium).
Viktor Faizulin (Russia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Football Every Day
timelineItems.text: Origi becomes #BEL's youngest ever goalscorer in a #WorldCup!

timelineItems.name: OptaJoe
timelineItems.text: 1 - #BEL scored with their first shot on target in this game against #RUS. Timely.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kevin Mirallas (Belgium) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Eden Hazard.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Perfect form. #BELvRUS http://t.co/bPyiZovWBV

timelineItems.name: ashrafuzzaman khan
timelineItems.text: Belgium... The dark horse.. #worldcup

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Marouane Fellaini (Belgium).
Corner,  Belgium. Conceded by Sergei Ignashevitch.

timelineItems.name: Paul Carr
timelineItems.text: Belgium advances to the #WorldCup knockout round for the first time since 2002.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Belgium 1, Russia 0.
